sentences.english: He thought I was signing up for a drawing class in order to see nude girls.
sentences.chinese: 他以为我为了去看裸体姑娘而报名了一个美术课。

sentences.english: Nudism, the council decided, was doing the resort more harm than good.
sentences.chinese: 委员会认定在休闲胜地的裸体行为弊大于利。

sentences.english: Few would dispute his status as one of the finest artists.
sentences.chinese: 在艺术领域，裸体画一直占有重要地位。

sentences.english: A father is painting his own daughter, nak …
sentences.chinese: 一个父亲在画自己女儿的裸体画。

sentences.english: The nudists will enjoy their beautiful summer day at the resort of Usedom.
sentences.chinese: 游客将在乌塞敦的裸体村庄内度过夏日惬意的一天。

sentences.english: Skinny-dipping at gunpoint did not do the South Africans much good.
sentences.chinese: 南非运动员被枪指着裸体下水也没有多大益处。

sentences.english: More than 18,000 Mexicans stripped off, baring all for the sake of art.
sentences.chinese: 000余名墨西哥人脱光衣服，为了艺术而赤身裸体。

sentences.english: What do you think about that Zhao Yazhi was nakedness for public utility?
sentences.chinese: 赵雅芝裸体出镜，晚节不保还是为公益献身？

sentences.english: She shows herself naked in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 她就像在空中展露自己的裸体。

sentences.english: A beautiful, naked woman appears out of nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 一个裸体美女顿然出现在他面前，并走向了他。

sentences.english: Can you imagine that? A father is painting his own daughter, nak…
sentences.chinese: 你能想象吗？一个父亲在画自己女儿的裸体画。

sentences.english: His two closest nude-curious friends are female, after all.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他的两个亲近的好奇裸体好友却都是女性。

sentences.english: The book On Nude Art written by Chen Zui was the bestseller of the year.
sentences.chinese: 陈醉《裸体艺术论》成为当年的畅销书。

sentences.english: Nude-hiking advocates say they aren't out to startle people.
sentences.chinese: 裸体远足倡导者称，他们没有惊吓别人的企图。

sentences.english: None of this nudity and gramophones half the night.
sentences.chinese: 没有那种裸体，也没有半夜还开着的留声机。

sentences.english: I also believe those who flaunt their nudity are inconsiderate and selfish.
sentences.chinese: 我也相信那些炫耀他们裸体的人是自私的不体谅人的。

definition: not wearing one thread (idiom); absolutely naked/without a stitch of clothing/in one's birthday suit
to strip naked/to strip nude/(coll.) to find oneself a partner
nude model/abbr. for 裸體模特|裸体模特[luo3 ti3 mo2 te4]
